newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo rubber futures end mixed, off early lows.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo rubber futures end mixed, off early lows.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended mixed on Wednesday, recovering from the day's lows as short-covering emerged ahead of the close, reflecting the yen's weakness against the dollar, traders said.
Rubber futures ranged from 0.9 yen per kg down to 0.9 yen firmer. Benchmark January finished 0.4 yen lower at 136.6 yen.
Activity was lacklustre amid a lack of fresh incentives.

Trading was mainly dominated by position-adjustment ahead of the spot expiry next week. "Prices are likely to move within narrow ranges until the spot expiry next Monday," an analyst at a commodity broker said.
